GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article with the given id passed as params

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments associated with an article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: inserts a new comment to the associated article and responds with the new comment

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment passed as params. does not return any content

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article in the database and responds with the updated artcile. accepts an object in the form of { inc_votes: X } where X is a whole number, by which the article.votes is updated. X can be a positive or negative number.
